build docker image : 
docker build -t api .

tag docker image : 
tag - docker tag api:latest 439398671644.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/awslab:v1

#install aws-cli
#run command "aws configure"

aws ecr get-login-password --region=us-east-1

note the passphrase
aws ecr --region us-east-1 | docker login -u AWS -p <encrypted_token> <repo_uri>



 aws ecr --region us-east-1 | docker login -u AWS -p  439398671644.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/awslab

#push docker image to aws ecr
docker push 439398671644.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/ecr-repo-for-tf-lab:v1
